document.full_text: president barack obama said in a television interview on wednesday he decided not to release photos of osama bin laden's body because it could incite violence and be used as an al qaeda propaganda tool.
document.title: obama won't release bin laden photos, cites risks
lines_and_colors: president barack obama said in a television interview on wednesday he decided not to release photos of osama bin laden's body because it could incite violence and be used as an al qaeda propaganda tool.
